chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: FooMatic 5000 is an application that allows you maximum productivity when creating widgets in your factory.

Now that we have finished installing, lets learn about some Concepts used in FooMatic 5000

chapter.title: Concepts
chapter.para: Let's look at the basic concepts involved with FooMatic 5000.

section.title: New File
section.para: This example Chapter is going to be extra long, so we can see what different sections look like. Sound good? Let procced.
p
p
p
p
p
p
p
p
p
p
p
p

section.title: New Foo
section.para: New Foo can be created by going to the file menu and selecting new and then clicking Foo. This launches the New Foo Wizard.
Keep in mind that Creating new foo may lead to foopeltunnel syndrome. You have been warned.

section.title: New Bar
section.para: New Bar is easy to integrate. In the Orgaznization screen, select 2 or more Foos which you would like to work with. While they are onscreen and selected, goto the File menu and click New then Bar. After a few minutes a new Bar widget will appear with the characteristics of all your favorite Foo
section.tip: Keep in mind that Bar is derived from Foos so if you delete a foo, Bar will be automagically updated to reflect this. If you delete all of the Foos that a Bar depends on, it will silently die.
section.para: The number of Bars your system can create is limited to 5. Why? No good reason. Just deal with it.

section.title: New Baz
section.para: We would advise you not to create Baz. I mean come on, what do you really want to do with all this Baz. Baz may actually be considered harmful by Jakob Nielsen, so just don't do it.

section.title: Exporting
section.para: You can Export our Foo into many diffent file types. One reason to export is to Import this data back into some other system.

section.title: Importing
section.para: Importing an alien file format from our competators file formats has never been easier!
